foreignData.name: Zwieträchtiger Geist
foreignData.text:
Lege am Ende des Zuges eines Gegners Deiner Wahl für jeden Schadenspunkt, der Dir in dessen Zug zugefügt wurde, eine +1/+1 Marke auf den Zwieträchtigen Geist.
Entferne am Ende Deines Zuges alle diese +1/+1 Marken vom Zwieträchtigen Geist.

name: Discordant Spirit
originalText:
At end of target opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you this turn.
At end of your turn, remove all these counters from Discordant Spirit.

rulings.text: This will not count damage that was prevented.
In Two-Headed Giant, triggers only once per end of turn, not once for each player.

text:
At the beginning of each end step, if it's an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you this turn.
At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Discordant Spirit.
